Texto: 
biapical ronchi, wheezing. elevated temperature.

bronchial lavage cytology positive for pneumocystis-like organisms.
positive fluorescence-labelled antibody test for pneumocystis sp.
hiv positive.
cxr:
bilateral ground glass opacities.
cystic vs. cavitary leisions, predominantly in superior lobes.
pneumocystis pneumonia in a patient with aids.
tb
fungal pneumonia.
46 y.o. man with several weeks of fever, shortness of breath, chest pain.
